site.name: DISPARUS.ORG
site.description: Citizen platform for reporting missing persons in Africa

hero.title: Help us find the missing in Africa
hero.subtitle: Over 25,000 children and people reported missing every year
hero.description: Abductions, ransoms, ritual crimes: let's end the silence

sections.contribution_title: Your contribution can save a life

causes.abductions_desc: A threat that strikes without distinction across all layers of society.
causes.ritual_desc: Barbaric acts primarily targeting children and the most fragile individuals.
causes.runaways_desc: Vulnerable persons who are lost or disoriented, requiring immediate reporting.

contribution.intro: Every piece of information matters. A testimony, an update, a simple share on social media can make all the difference.
contribution.decisive_link: You could be the decisive link
contribution.outro: that helps find a missing person.
contribution.share_info: Even if you're not sure about the information, share it. Investigators and families can cross-reference testimonies to advance their searches.
contribution.step1_desc: Use search by name, ID or location to find the file.
contribution.step2_desc: Click on the file to see all details and existing contributions.
contribution.step3_desc: Fill out the form with your testimony, observation or new information.

cta.title: Never wait 24 hours!
cta.message: Contrary to popular belief, you don't need to wait 24 hours to report a disappearance.
cta.better: It's better to report and find the person quickly than to waste precious time.

safety.photos_desc: Ensure you always have clear and recent photos of your loved ones.
safety.contacts_desc: Children should know at least one phone number and their address.
safety.immediate_desc: Don't wait 24h. The first hours are crucial for the search.

why_act.network_desc: The more users there are, the more chances of finding a person increase.
why_act.verification_desc: Each report is moderated to ensure the reliability of the information.
why_act.free_desc: Our platform is completely free and accessible to everyone.
why_act.coverage_desc: 54 African countries covered with thousands of cities listed.

report_form.title: Report a disappearance
report_form.subtitle: Fill this form with all available information
report_form.last_seen_placeholder: Ex: Central market, near the school...
report_form.physical_desc_placeholder: Height, weight, distinctive features, clothing worn...
